nodes.speaker: Mentor
nodes.text: Cyber Tower has tricky spots, so you’ll need tools like strong passwords, MFA, and scam detectors. Have you heard of those?

options.text: Yes, I'm ready. Let me start!

nodes.speaker: Mentor
nodes.text: No worries—we have awesome trainers to guide you. See these rooms? Each one has a mentor waiting. Head over and meet them!

nodes.speaker: Mentor
nodes.text: Great! Before you dash off, meet the mentors in these rooms. They have what you need to reach the higher floors!

nodes.speaker: Mentor
nodes.text: Here, take this key. The mentors are ready for you.

nodes.speaker: Mentor
nodes.text: Good luck out there. The tower is cheering you on.

reward.message: (Mentor hands you a gleaming green key.)

nodes.speaker: System
nodes.text: (a new article <welcome> is available in your Traveler's journal)
